item.title: Mass Shooter's Diary
item.dc:creator: @Speljohan Speljohan
item.description:
@Speljohan wrote:

[quote=“Frell, post:13, topic:370212”][quote author=Speljohan link=topic=466328.msg3411433#msg3411433 date=1290716318]

There needs to be a 6th month wait on gun purchases (although that may just prolong a shooting). But you can’t just outlaw guns in the US, black market 101.
[/quote]Fixed. Of course, it wouldn’t really work anywhere if there is a strong gun-culture.

Whatd you fix? For a place like the US our gun crime rate is relatively low to the crimes prevented due to concealed firearms, sorta cancels it out.[/quote]Our gun crime rate is lower though

I just added “in the US” to clarify this isn’t the case in every single country.

Read full topic

Oh I agree, I’m not disagreeing with that, if those people who had gun licenses were allowed their guns, then they could have potentially stopped him earlier.

item.title: Mass Shooter's Diary
item.dc:creator: @xx_matty_xx Justin Bieber
item.description:
@xx_matty_xx wrote:

[quote=“Thug-life, post:7, topic:370212”][quote author=Moparisthebest link=topic=466328.msg3410722#msg3410722 date=1290659422]
I don’t see a wikileak with the info that he killed 2 or 3 licensed concealed carry holders who were stripped of their guns due to schools being a ‘gun free zone’. That worked out well for them, didn’t it?

In other words, gun control helped this lunatic kill all those people.
[/quote]

Gun availability also helped this lunatic kill all those people.[/quote]

It’s safer to make guns widely available than make little gun free zones. The US are never going to decide that guns are bad and they should all get rid of them.

Read full topic
